resources.string: Press the button below to fix your phone settings
(May open Settings app on newer devices)
Some settings were fixed. Others may require different permissions.
Could not fix settings. Please check app permissions.
Error trying to fix settings. Please try again.
This app needs permission to modify system settings to function properly. Please follow the instructions in the next screens.

On the next screen:

1. Tap "Allow modifying system settings" to switch it ON

2. Tap the back button to return to the app (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)

You need to turn ON "Allow modifying system settings" for GrannyAid to work properly.

1. Tap the toggle switch to turn it ON

2. Press the back button to return to the app (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)
Bluetooth permission denied. Some features may not work.

Please follow these steps to turn ON Mobile Data:

1. Look for "Mobile data", "Cellular data", or "Data usage" option

2. Tap the switch to turn it ON

3. Return to GrannyAid by pressing the back button (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)

Please follow these steps to turn OFF Mobile Data:

1. Look for "Mobile data", "Cellular data", or "Data usage" option

2. Tap the switch to turn it OFF

3. Return to GrannyAid by pressing the back button (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)

Please navigate to find Mobile Data settings:

1. Look for "Network & Internet" or "Connections"

2. Then find "Mobile Data", "Mobile Network", or "Data Usage"

3. Tap the switch to change it as needed

4. Return to GrannyAid by pressing the back button (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)

Please follow these steps to turn ON WiFi:

1. Find the WiFi option in Settings

2. Tap the switch to turn it ON

3. Return to GrannyAid by pressing the back button (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)

Please follow these steps to turn OFF WiFi:

1. Find the WiFi option in Settings

2. Tap the switch to turn it OFF

3. Return to GrannyAid by pressing the back button (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)

Please follow these steps to turn ON Airplane Mode:

1. Find the Airplane Mode option in Settings

2. Tap the switch to turn it ON

3. Return to GrannyAid by pressing the back button (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)

Please follow these steps to turn OFF Airplane Mode:

1. Find the Airplane Mode option in Settings

2. Tap the switch to turn it OFF

3. Return to GrannyAid by pressing the back button (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)

Please navigate to find Airplane Mode settings:

1. Look for "Network & Internet" or "Connections"

2. Then find "Airplane Mode"

3. Tap the switch to change it as needed

4. Return to GrannyAid by pressing the back button (arrow ← button at bottom of screen or swipe from edge of screen)
All settings are already correct! No changes needed.
